p: The essential oil from the different L. multiflora Mold. collections were tested for their antibacterial activity against Staphylococcus aureus, Escherichia coli and Pseudomonas aeruginosa. Three concentrations (C 1, C 2, C 3) of each EO were tested using the wells diffusion agar technique. The results in terms of inhibition zone diameter (mm) are summarised in Table 6.
